ID: 31422
Title: max_allowed_packet length is set to 1024 but its not working for string length.
Description:
## Bug Report

Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

### 1. Minimal reproduce step (Required)

<!-- a step by step guide for reproducing the bug. -->
```sql
set global max_allowed_packet=100;
set global net_buffer_length=100;  # change session
select @@net_buffer_length, @@max_allowed_packet;
SELECT length("") as len;

```
### 2. What did you expect to see? (Required)
```sql
mysql> select @@net_buffer_length, @@max_allowed_packet;
+---------------------+----------------------+
| @@net_buffer_length | @@max_allowed_packet |
+---------------------+----------------------+
|                1024 |                 1024 |
+---------------------+----------------------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

mysql> SELECT length("") as len;
ERROR 1153 (08S01): Got a packet bigger than 'max_allowed_packet' bytes
```
### 3. What did you see instead (Required)
```sql
mysql> select @@net_buffer_length, @@max_allowed_packet;
+---------------------+----------------------+
| @@net_buffer_length | @@max_allowed_packet |
+---------------------+----------------------+
| 100                 |                 1024 |
+---------------------+----------------------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

mysql> SELECT length("") as len;
+------+
| len  |
+------+
| 1024 |
+------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

```
